perturbation.original_text: 1.1     "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" means the SpinRecords.com name and logo  and  other  trademarks,  trade  names  and service names including but not limited  to those set forth on Exhibit A attached hereto and incorporated herein                                --------- by  reference  and  all  Intellectual  Property  Rights  related  thereto. SpinRecords.com  Brand  Features  shall include any derivatives, improvements or modifications  thereto  or  thereof and any Intellectual Property rights related thereto.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1     "Spinrecords.com Brand Features" means only the SpinRecords.com name and logo as explicitly depicted in Exhibit A attached hereto.  It does not include any other trademarks, trade names, service names, or Intellectual Property Rights related thereto. SpinRecords.com Brand Features shall not include any derivatives, improvements or modifications thereto or thereof and any Intellectual Property rights related thereto.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflict in the definition of 'Spinrecords.com Brand Features.' The original definition is broad and includes trademarks, trade names, and derivatives. The modified definition narrowly limits it to the name and logo in Exhibit A, excluding derivatives or related IP. This ambiguity impacts the scope of licensed materials and ownership.

perturbation.original_text: 5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted              --------------------- by  NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad revenue  at  an  average  rate  no lower then $6.50 per one thousand impressions (CPM)  payable  to  NETTAXI  which  results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising Revenue  is  multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share.  SpinRecords.com shall be responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.5     SpinRecords.com  Rate. In full consideration for the rights granted by NETTAXI,  SpinRecords.com  agrees  to  pay NETTAXI fifty (50%) percent of ad revenue; however, in no event shall the rate exceed $3.00 per one thousand impressions (CPM) payable to NETTAXI which results when the SpinRecords.com Advertising Revenue is multiplied by SpinRecords.com's AR Share. SpinRecords.com shall be responsible  for  payment  of  all taxes based on the Advertising Revenue except taxes  based  on  NETTAXI's  income.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction regarding the rate SpinRecords.com pays NETTAXI. Originally, the rate had a floor of $6.50 CPM. Now, it has a ceiling of $3.00 CPM. This directly conflicts with the original payment terms and introduces uncertainty about the revenue share.

perturbation.original_text: 8.2     Convenience.  NETTAXI  may terminate this Agreement at any time for              ----------- its  convenience,  for  no  reason or for any reason, upon sixty (60) days prior written  notice  to  SpinRecords.com.  In  the  event  of  such  termination, Spinrecords.com  shall  be  entitled  to receive and retain all payments made or payable  by  NETTAXI  prior  to  the  date  of  termination. SpinRecords.com may terminate  this  Agreement  for no reason or for any reason upon sixty (60) days prior  written  notice  to  NETTAXI.
perturbation.changed_text: 8.2     Convenience.  NETTAXI  may terminate this Agreement at any time for its convenience, for no reason or for any reason, upon sixty (60) days prior written notice to SpinRecords.com.  In the event of such termination, Spinrecords.com shall not be entitled to receive or retain any payments made or payable by NETTAXI after the date of the termination notice. SpinRecords.com may terminate this Agreement for no reason or for any reason upon sixty (60) days prior written notice to NETTAXI.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a conflicting term regarding payments upon termination for convenience. The original text says SpinRecords.com can retain all payments made or payable before termination. The modified text says SpinRecords.com will not be able to receive or retain payments after the termination notice. This creates an ambiguity in the payments due upon termination.
